name: Little Orphan Millie
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Mick Kelly
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Milhouse's parents are lost at sea, which causes him to become a troubled loner. But his new persona makes him the new most popular kid at school, which sparks jealousy in Bart.
